translations: （尤指为逗乐而）模仿；（动物或植物为自身安全）模拟（另一种动物或植物）（同mimic）

sentences.sentence: Rip off the greats, and the goods as well. Mimick and make it your own.
sentences.translation: 借鉴大师及他们的作品，模仿然后把它变成自己的东西。

sentences.sentence: You code the automaton to interface with "test" routines which mimick the appropriate response of the piece of code that would normally be called up in that instance.
sentences.translation: 你的代码自动机与“测试”程序，模拟了一段代码，通常被称为在适当的响应接口实例。
